description:
Git Extensions is a standalone UI tool for managing git repositories. It also integrates with Windows Explorer and Microsoft Visual Studio (2015/2017/2019).


Release Notes Highlights
- Required: .NET 9.0 Desktop Runtime v9.0.11 x64 or later 9.x
- Recommended: Git 2.51.0 or later
- Two fixes
- Updated translations (ja, ko 100%; ta, zh, fr, tr, ru > 95%; others less)
What's Changed
- fix(CheckSettingsLogic): Prefer native executables by @mstv in https://github.com/gitextensions/gitextensions/pull/12704
- fix(plugin loading): Await registration before use by @mstv in https://github.com/gitextensions/gitextensions/pull/12707
Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitextensions/gitextensions/compare/v6.0.4...v6.0.5
